name: Bubble Sort Puzzle
description:
Witness an unconventional matching puzzle game stage where you will need to apply skills, attention and strategy to solve the game by matching colors in as few actions as possible. Test how far you can go with multiple colors, patterns, and tubes in one level at a given time.

* How to play:

Download and start the game

Click the start button

Arrange the color balls in the tube in the order of color matching

Drag and drop balls to match them in logic puzzles

Enjoy the wonderful brain teaser game!
